package.shortDescription: This is a sample new package. Firmware should be greater than 13.0

descriptionlist.description: Enable ssh to localhost for appstore terminal clients such as Prompt 2 or Server Auditor.After installing a new ssh port 50022 will be activated, which should be used when using the Terminal client to log in. To connect through Prompt 2 or Server Auditor, enter the host address as 127.0.0.1 and port as 50022.
